sentences.english: At first, it was easy to allow my old habits to swallow me.
sentences.chinese: 最開始，我的舊習很容易就吞食了我。

sentences.english: it is said the black hole can engulf everything nearby such as stars.
sentences.chinese: 據說黑洞可以將周圍的一切物體，如星星吞食掉。

sentences.english: He shall be eaten of worms.
Swallow 200 micrograms a day of chromium polynicotinate.
sentences.chinese: 每天吞食200毫克的煙酸鉻。

sentences.english: In others, suicides in women who ingest pesticides need to be addressed.
sentences.chinese: 另一些國家則需要處理婦女吞食農藥自殺的問題。
老虎吞食了捕獲到的動物。

sentences.english: Chinese folk legend, the solar eclipse is "Tengu" caused by swallowing the sun.
sentences.chinese: 中國民間傳說中，日食是“天狗”吞食太陽造成的。

sentences.english: If you swallow too much food, you must choke your throat.
sentences.chinese: 如果你吞食太多，你的喉嚨一定會噎住。

sentences.english: Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed and some few to be chewed and digested.
sentences.chinese: 書有可淺嘗者，有可吞食者，少數則須細嚼慢嚥。

sentences.english: Sometimes you can feel your energy being cannibalized in great, horrifying mouthfuls.
sentences.chinese: 有時候你感到自己的精力被巨大恐怖地一口口吞食掉。

sentences.english: Closeto nightfall a dolphin took the small hook he had rebaited.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏之際，一條海豚吞食了他重新放上魚餌的小鉤子。

sentences.english: It's a silly fish that is caught twice with the same bait.
sentences.chinese: 再愚蠢的魚也不會再次吞食同一塊釣餌。

sentences.english: Fully-charged Devourers will rip apart a large Scorpion army quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 完全充能的吞食者可以非常迅速的幹掉大量的蠍子。

sentences.english: HCN is extremely dangerous if swallowed.
sentences.chinese: 氰化氫如果被吞食，是非常危險的。

sentences.english: N'aix restores some of his life force by eating flesh.
sentences.chinese: 食屍鬼通過吞食目標的血肉來回復自己的生命。

sentences.english: Or in sleep rehearse perfect kills and eat.
sentences.chinese: 在睡眠中，也不去演習完美的捕殺和吞食。

definition: to tear at (with the teeth, like one animal attacking another)
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
